subject: More wierd.
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
------=_NextPart_000_5c77_5be4_3853
Content-Type: text/plain; format=flowed

This is from a linear sweep session this afternoon. I didn't even hear this 
until I ran noise reduction on the whole segemnt, and went back through it. 
I've been "playing"with this box (15) for a few weeks to see how much I 
could improve it, and to test these micro echo boxes.

I like running the short tests, then run to the PC, and copy the voices out. 
It goes pretty fast.

Frank-S
